operations.summary: Get a list of all runs for a particular environment

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter runs by their state. E.g. new, in_progress, complete

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to display, starts from zero

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of runs to return per page. Defaults to 10 runs

operations.summary: Start a new run for this particular environment.

parameters.name: browsers
parameters.description: An array of browsers to run this against, overrides the defaults

parameters.name: environment_id
parameters.description: Use a specific environment for this run

parameters.name: webhook
parameters.description: HTTP webhook that we will POST notifications to. We expect a confirmation callback for before_test.

parameters.name: conflict
parameters.description: How should we handle current other runs that are in progress

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Only run tests with a specific result

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Only run tests having all specified tags

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: Only run tests for this specific site

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Only run tests matching this string

parameters.name: tests
parameters.description: Only run tests matching this criteria. Can be comma separated list of ids or an array of test ids. Optionally pass 'all' to run all tests in your account.

parameters.name: smart_folder_id
parameters.description: Only run tests matching smart folder criteria

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: Only run tests that were part of that previous run

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: An arbitrary string to associate with the run

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: A run ID

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Extra details to display: steps, history

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: A run ID

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Extra details to display: steps, history

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: A run ID

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Extra details to display: steps, history

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to display, starts from zero

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of runs to return per page. Defaults to 10 runs

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: An array of sort options. Sortable columns are title. Format is [{"col1": "ASC"}]

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Only return tests with a specific result

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Only return tests having all specified tags

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: Only return tests for this specific site

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Only return tests matching this string

parameters.name: tests
parameters.description: Only return tests matching this criteria. Can be comma separated list of ids or an array of test ids. Optionally pass 'all' to run all tests in your account.

parameters.name: smart_folder_id
parameters.description: Only return tests matching smart folder criteria

operations.summary: Get a specific test from a run

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: A run ID

parameters.name: test_id
parameters.description: A test ID

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Extra details to display: steps, history
